name: Kurr

trait.name: Rampage
text: When Kurr reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, Kurr can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Kurr makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 179
